column1: Rowlie was killed during the in early January, {{TA
''Rowlie'' is diminutive of Rowland, from ''hrod'' "fame" + land.<ref>''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', Giving of Names</ref> ''Appledore'' is an old word for "apple tree".
